TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ScaffoldColumnAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: 指定类或数据列是否使用基架。

span.span: Specifies whether a class or data column uses scaffolding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基架是用于生成基于数据库架构的 web 页面模板的机制。Scaffolding is the mechanism for generating web page templates based on database schemas. ASP.NET 动态数据使用基架来生成基于 Web 的 UI，可使用户可以查看和更新数据库。ASP.NET Dynamic Data uses scaffolding to generate Web-based UI that lets a user to view and update a database. 此类使用属性来启用基架动态数据网站中。This class uses the property to enable scaffolding in a Dynamic Data Web Site. 基架动态显示基于数据模型不需要的物理页面的页面，从而增强了 ASP.NET 页框架。Scaffolding enhances ASP.NET page framework by dynamically displaying pages based on the data model with no physical pages required. 基架提供以下功能：Scaffolding provides the following capabilities: - 最小或无需创建数据驱动的 Web 应用程序代码。Minimal or no code to create a data-driven Web application. - 缩短开发时间。Quick development time. - 页面被完全正常运行，并且包括显示、 insert、 编辑、 删除、 排序和分页功能。Pages that are fully functional and include display, insert, edit, delete, sorting, and paging functionalities. - 基于数据库架构的内置数据验证。Built-in data validation that is based on the database schema. - 筛选器创建的每个外键或布尔字段。Filters that are created for each foreign key or Boolean fields. 此类可用于启用或禁用通过将此特性应用于相应的数据字段对象表示的表的类中的数据模型中的数据列的基架。This class can be used to enable or disable scaffolding of data columns in a data model by applying this attribute to the appropriate data field object in the class that represents the table. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示将基架属性应用于产品分部类中的 ProductID 对象并将其设置为 AdventureWorksLT 数据库中的 Products 表的 ProductID 列`true.`它会隐藏通过将基架属性应用到 ThumbnailPhotoFileName 对象并将其设置为 ThumbnailPhotoFileName 列`false`。The following code example exposes the ProductID column of the Products table in the AdventureWorksLT data base by applying the scaffold property to the ProductID object in the Products partial class and setting it to `true.` It hides the ThumbnailPhotoFileName column by applying the scaffold property to the ThumbnailPhotoFileName object and setting it to `false`. ```csharp [MetadataType(typeof(ProductMetadata))] public partial class Product { } public class ProductMetadata { [ScaffoldColumn(true)] public object ProductID; [ScaffoldColumn(false)] public object ThumbnailPhotoFileName; } ``` ```vb Public Partial Class Product End Class Public Class ProductMetadata Public ProductID As Object Public ThumbnailPhotoFileName As Object End Class ``` 若要编译此代码示例，需要满足以下要求：To compile the example code, you need the following: - 任何版本的 Visual Studio 2010 或更高版本。Any edition of Visual Studio 2010 or later. - AdventureWorksLT 示例数据库。The AdventureWorksLT sample database. 有关如何下载和安装 SQL Server 示例数据库的信息，请参阅[Microsoft SQL Server 产品示例： 数据库](https://github.com/Microsoft/sql-server-samples/releases)GitHub 上。For information about how to download and install the SQL Server sample database, see [Microsoft SQL Server Product Samples: Database](https://github.com/Microsoft/sql-server-samples/releases) on GitHub. 请确保安装正确版本的正在运行的 SQL Server 版本的示例数据库。Make sure that you install the correct version of the sample database for the version of SQL Server that you are running. - 动态数据网站。A Dynamic Data Web site. 这使您可以创建数据库和包含要自定义的数据字段的类和方法来重写数据上下文。This enables you to create a data context for the database and the class that contains the data field to customize and the methods to override. 此外，它会创建要使用之前所述的页面中的环境。In addition, it creates the environment in which to use the page described before. 有关详细信息，请参阅[演练： 创建一个新动态数据网站使用基架](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1564aef2-9103-436a-9806-c8ad7abd616a)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Creating a New Dynamic Data Web Site Using Scaffolding](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1564aef2-9103-436a-9806-c8ad7abd616a).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(bool scaffold) cil managed

param.name: scaffold
param.span: 用于指定是否启用基架的值。

span.span: The value that specifies whether scaffolding is enabled.

summary.span: 使用 属性初始化 的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of using the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以设置`scaffold`到`true`整个数据模型公开的 CRUD （创建、 读取、 更新和删除） 操作数据库中的所有数据列，通过设置`scaffold`到`true`在 Global.asax 文件中或公开个人数据CRUD 操作通过设置到数据表中的列`scaffold`到`true`分部类中。You can set `scaffold` to `true` for the entire data model to expose all data columns in the database for CRUD (Create, Read, Update and Delete) operations by setting `scaffold` to `true` in the Global.asax file or expose individual data columns in a data table to CRUD operations by setting `scaffold` to `true` in the partial class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Scaffold As Boolean
public: property bool Scaffold { bool get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置用于指定是否启用基架的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value that specifies whether scaffolding is enabled.

value.span: 如果启用基架，则为 ；否则为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可用于启用数据模型中的单个数据列中的基架。You can use this property to enable scaffolding in individual data columns in a data model. 如果此属性设置为`true`在 global.asax 文件中，整个数据模型将公开的 CRUD （创建、 读取、 更新和删除） 操作数据库中的所有数据列。If you set this property to `true` in the global.asax file, the entire data model will expose all data columns in the database for CRUD (Create, Read, Update and Delete) operations.
